Title: Illegal
Writer: Carl W. Lucas (screenplay), Marco Shepherd (story), Marco Shepherd
Actors: Shirley Rumierk, Luis Bordonada, Omar Leyva, Art LaFleur
Plot: Tells the stories of a group of people in Ciudad de Juarez with one thing in common: they are all looking for a better life for them and their families. For many, that better life waits just a short walk away in the United States.
